episodesJson.title: Crisis Hotline
episodesJson.description: This week, we watched the 2019 movie Crisis Hotline. When Simon, a jaded LGBT Crisis Hotline operator, gets a call from someone who claims he's going to kill some porn producers, he has to... sit patiently on the phone until the guy eventually gets to his point. It's a very boring thriller, is our point.
topics: The steps in the standard gay dating tango
Meeting your boyfriend's bosses' boss, who's also a creepy sex trafficker
